basisSet.dc:title: cc-pwCVTZ
basisSet.dct:abstract: TZ2P Triple Zeta + Polarization + Tight Core
basisSet.dc:description:
Correlation Consistent Polarized Core/Valence Triple Zeta (cc-pwCVTZ) Basis -------------------------------------------------------------------------- Elements Contraction References B - Ne: (12s,7p,3d,1f) -> [6s,5p,3d,1f] T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 90, 1007 (1989). Al - Ar: (18s,12p,4d,2f) -> [7s,6p,4d,2f] K.A. Peterson and T.H. Dunning, Jr. J. Chem. Phys. 117, 10548 (2002). Br : (22s,15p,11d,3f,1g) -> [8s,7p,5d,3f,1g] K.A. Peterson (to be published) Note: these are preliminary exponents.
The correlation consistent core-valence basis sets extend the ideas of the original cc-pVxZ sets by including extra functions designed for core-core and core-valence correlation. The weighted core/valence basis sets weight the KL intershell correlation energy at the expense of the KK correlation.
